title: 655: HOW THE DCA ARMY WILL DRIVE A $1 MILLION BITCOIN PRICE!!!!!
description:
The entire supply of Bitcoin will eventually go to the zealot DCA (Dollar Cost Average) army, bringing enough fiat into BTC that fiat ceases to exist.

This could very realistically create a permanently upwards sloping Bitcoin price floor and drive the BTC price toward a (relatively) stable price of $1 million per coin within a year or so.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
